QuestData.Title: Nazgrel
QuestData.Description: Escaping Stonemaul was the easy part. The ogre filth that rule the pits still have my son.$b$bFor a while they used him as leverage to ensure I would fight in their arenas. But now that I have escaped they will try to train him to replace me.$b$bPlease, rescue my son. If they see me they will kill him instantly.
QuestData.RewardText: This deed will never be forgotten as long as I or my son live. You have my gratitude, hero, and my loyalty.
